name: Kaguya
skill: Deals 2585/3085 DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.
ability: Skill attacks have a significant chance of significantly decreasing the target's ATK speed.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a woman from the moon. She may look like a child, but her knowledge is nearly unfathomable. If you talk to her you'll see that she is smarter than you imagined. She always carries a stuffed rabbit, because it makes her feel better when she's lonely. Actually, her cute little rabbit might have a really big secret hidden inside...
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 17/08/16
◦ Summon rate increased from 07/09/16 - 21/09/16 for the Mid-Autumn Day event

main: "It'll be a cinch with my lunar technology."
